[@juul](@22YV3HX/BGClXH49ZebkcepqRpj7a9f5s0ddwhDSfxk=.ed25519) 

Thanks for the recommendation -- I've just downloaded it. I was considering uploading as a blob, but it's a few hundred MB so that's *probably* not a good idea. Any specific pages or chapters you like, or is this one of those "read left to right, top to bottom, page to page" type of resources?
